description:
Cao Dingkun fought for half his life and won success at the expense of his youth. Unfortunately, he lost his love due to age, as his lover cheated on him with the protegee he regarded as a brother. At the moment when he was pushed off the cliff, he thought he would be saying goodbye to the world from then on. Yet with a fool’s luck — he was reborn. 

This is a story of a movie emperor who was reborn into a small and unknown young artist, watch as he uses his accumulated experience to cut down his enemies and climb to the top again.>
